Package org.jlab.mya

Provides the core jmyapi classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataNexus
    Manages the possibly multiple data sources required to service requests to a cluster of Mya hosts, which make up a deployment.
    Event
    A Mya history event such as an update or discontinuity marker.
    EventStream<T extends Event>
    Provides an I/O Channel for streaming Mya events.
    ExtraInfo
    Provides additional information about an EPICS PV, which unlike standard Metadata, is versioned (may change over time).
    Metadata
    The metadata associated with an EPICS PV.
    QueryParams
    The parameters required to query for events.
    QueryService
    Provides query access to the Mya database.
    TimeUtil
    Utility methods for conversion between Mya's database time format and Java's native Instant.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataType
    Mya DataTypes.
    Deployment
    Mya deployments.
    EventCode
    Mya event codes.

Package org.jlab.mya Description

Provides the core jmyapi classes.
